alert.note: Alert for Coastal Pasco; Inland Pasco (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 10:09AM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Pasco County through 1045 AM EDT... At 1009 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near New Port Richey East, or near New Port Richey, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds of 40 to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Moon Lake, Jay B Starkey Wilderness Park, Gowers Corner, Shady Hills, Trinity and Odessa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
